hotels.title: Mexico City Escape in Vibrant Polanco with Rooftop Pool & Bar
hotels.description: Kimpton Virgilio, an IHG Hotel is a vibrant oasis in the heart of Mexico City. Located in Pilanco, you'll be best placed to explore the upscale boutiques, restaurants and museums that make this neighbourhood so undeniably cool. Spend your days basking in the sunshine by the rooftop pool and keeping hydrated at La Caña bar. For an authentic Spanish and Latin tapas experience, head down to Pepe Mesa Española restaurant, where share platters and colourful cocktails burst with flavour.

hotels.vendor_name: Novotel Mexico City World Trade Center
hotels.title: Mexico City Stylish Escape Near World Trade Center with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant culture and cosmopolitan charm of Mexico City with a stay at a stylish hotel, perfectly located in the heart of the city's bustling World Trade Centre district. This is the perfect launchpad for travellers looking to explore the city's rich history, world-class museums and tantalising food scene. Savour fresh Mexican fusion at Delia Bistro or make use of the hotels privileged location for a night on the town. When it's time to retreat to your city oasis keep up your routine at the fitness centre or savour in-room dining.

hotels.title: Mexico City Glamour in Historic Reforma District with Sky-High Pool, Rooftop Bar & Spa
hotels.description: Perched along Mexico City’s legendary Reforma Avenue, this urban Sofitel sanctuary offers a seamless fusion of Parisian elegance and Mexican carnivalesque spirit. Soak up panoramic views of the cityscape from the hotel's plush rooms, relax with blissful treatments at the spa and enjoy a dip in the city's highest saltwater pool, perched on the 38th floor. Savour Mediterranean specialities at Balta, Mexican fire-inspired cuisine at Bajel, and cocktails paired with city views at Cityzen Rooftop Bar. For something unique, head to the speakeasy Freehouse for drinks and Prohibition-era charms. When it's time to explore, you'll find yourself steps from the Angel of Independence monument while Zona Rosa's boutiques and nightlife await.

hotels.vendor_name: HS HOTSSON Hotel CDMX Condesa Sur
hotels.title: Stylish All-Suite Mexico City Escape in Bohemian La Condesa Just 20 Minutes From Chapultepec Park
hotels.description: Discover the best of Mexico City through its most beloved bohemian district with an all-suite stay at HS HOTSSON Hotel CDMX Condesa Sur. Head out to explore La Condesa’s abundance of chic boutiques, artisanal cafes and fountain-filled promenades, or stay in to enjoy upscale traditional Mexican cuisine at Especialidades Restaurant. For some nature therapy, stroll just 20 minutes to find yourself in the vast emerald forest of Chapultepec Park, the oldest and grandest park of its kind in Latin America.
